actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To amend chapter 84 of title 5, United States Code, to provide that the basic annuity under the Federal Employees' Retirement System for a Member of Congress be computed using the formula generally applicable under such chapter for Federal employees.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to apply to Members of Congress the same basic annuity computation for the Federal Employees' Retirement System as is used for Federal employees.

titles.title: To amend chapter 84 of title 5, United States Code, to provide that the basic annuity under the Federal Employees' Retirement System for a Member of Congress be computed using the formula generally applicable under such chapter for Federal employees.
